articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
A lot has happened over the past few months in the @LensProtocol ecosystem.
In this thread I want to highlight some of the plans, projects, announcements, updates, and products we've shipped over the past year and also shed some light on what's coming next. 🌿❤️‍🔥⚡️
1/23

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🚨 P21: Simplifying Governance
In summary, this proposal:
- Speeds up Governance (15 > 10 days)
- Reduces threshold for members to elevate proposals to Snapshot (50k > 25k $CODE)
Please exercise your Gov rights and cast your votes, we need ~50 more 🙏 https://buff.ly/3W4gBU8

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
After a little bit over a month of the D_D Fundraising Operators working with founders, we’re happy to announce that the first one got funded!
Dec 16: @kirstenrpomales came to the Fundraising Office Hours with a draft proposal for a grant and she got it on Dec 26th!
Congrats!
